ing: 2 (3 ounce) packages lime-flavored gelatin mix (such as Jell-OÂ®)
1/2 cup chopped walnuts, or to taste (optional)
des: "A yummy mixture of lime gelatin and fruit, perfect for every occasion."
ins:
Dissolve lime gelatin in boiling water in a bowl; stir cold water into gelatin. Pour gelatin into a mold.
Stir apples, celery, and walnuts into gelatin. Refrigerate until firm, about 4 hours. Dip mold into hot water to loosen salad; place a plate on top of the mold and invert to release salad from mold.
